body_html:
The rocm compilation erros should be fixed now by also hipifying aten code in the caffe2 CIs, however we have now run into the compiler out of memory issue.

@Jorghi12 @iotamudelta I know pytorch CI has been reducing the number of concurrent jobs to bypass this issue currently and it normally takes 1hr to just do a pytorch rocm build. This PR is going to merge the caffe2 and pytorch builds, if we keep doing max_jobs=4 I'm afraid it will double the build time, it's definitely too long and people might end up just ignoring the rocm CI result. Is there an ETA on the fix of the OOM issue?
